ok, do you have any idea what is in /etc/rc.local ?
ok boot with kernel line option  "init=/bin/bash"  issue these command.   mount -no remount,rw / ;mv /etc/rc.local . ;mount -no remount,ro /

you have to hit [esc] at the grub menu.  select the boot option you want, hit [e] for edit that otpion, select the kernel line and hit [e] for edit that line,  and type in    init=/bin/bash     then hit [enter] and hit [b]
it is possable that it's not you rc.local that is hanging you out to dry.  but if it is, as it does appear to be, those instructions will circumvent the error.
